subject: Implement multi-target distribution across 21 projects (Phase 4)
description:
Create distribute_innovations.py for multi-repo GitHub issue/PR creation, NPM package publishing (auto for patches, manual for major), documentation auto-updates (pitch decks, landing page, GitHub profile), meta-vengine feedback loop integration, and Supermemory sync with full lineage tracking.

Success criteria:
- 8-15 GitHub issues (across 5-8 projects)
- 3-5 draft PRs
- 0-1 NPM packages auto-published
- 3 documentation projects updated
- Meta-vengine evolution triggered
- Supermemory synced

Files to create:
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/distribute_innovations.py (~800 lines)
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/package_manager.py (~300 lines)
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/meta_vengine_client.py (~250 lines)
